Trade/Device Name(s): Safety Blood Collection Needle (Without Needle Holder)
Submitter Information: Anhui Hongyu Wuzhou Medical Manufacturer Co., Ltd.
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Safety Blood Collection Needle (Without Needle Holder) intended for venous blood collection with a safety shield to prevent needle stick injury.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended to be used with a vacuum blood collection tube to collect venous blood; the safety shield is intended to protect against accidental needle stick injury.
